languages.custom: The languages it knew in life

description.value: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod + 2 type=necrotic average=true]] damage. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 11 format=long]] or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod + 2 type=slashing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 1d10 + @mod + 2 type=slashing average=true]] damage if used with two hands.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod + 2 type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 10/20 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. Any non-undead creature that touches an urn must succeed on a DC 17 &Reference[con]{Constitution} or &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} saving throw (creatureâ€™s choice) or take [[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage and become &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies and turns to dust.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Reduced Threat. This creature has -2 penalty on all ability checks and saving throws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
